name: 3d-ta-plugins
description: Claude Code plugin marketplace for 3D Technical Artists. Tutoring and troubleshooting for Substance Designer and other 3D tools.

plugins.name: substance-designer-tutor
plugins.description: A tutor for learning Substance Designer through the Designer First Steps course. Explains Tile Sampler, Height Blend, procedural shapes, and fabric embroidery. Helps troubleshoot when tutorials don't work on your computer.

plugins.name: youtube-transcript
plugins.description: Download transcripts from YouTube videos using yt-dlp. Simple workflow: check installation, list subtitles, download, convert to plain text.

plugins.name: whisper-transcription
plugins.description: Audio and video transcription using whisper.cpp CLI with FFmpeg preprocessing
